QuestData.Title: A Grim Equation
QuestData.Description: They were waiting for us when we crashed. It was all we could do to establish our small outpost.$b$bEven now they drain the souls of our fallen to fuel their attacks.$b$bDestroy their soul coffers. Free our comrades and let them join the Light.$b$bWhen you have finished, find Y'mera in the field. She has been sorely missed, but she will not have fallen. Of this I am certain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the three Soul Coffers on the Shattered Fields.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work. They will return in time, but we can use this advantage.
